sections.purpose: To perform thorough cleaning of laboratory components using ultrasonication.
sections.scope: Applicable to glassware and tool cleaning in Pharmaceutical Analysis.
procedure: Add cleaning solution to the tank and degas the liquid.
Place contaminated items in the cleaning basket.
Set the desired time and temperature parameters.
Press 'START' and ensure the items are effectively cleaned.
Remove and rinse the items with deionized water.
Empty the tank and wipe dry with a soft cloth.
Document the cleaning cycle if required by the maintenance log.
precautions: Ensure the cleaning solution is compatible with the items.
Do not use flammable solvents in the ultrasonic cleaner.
Verify the liquid level before starting every cycle.
Wear gloves when handling items from the cleaning solution.
